SELECT ((select count(*) from book_readed where book_id=book.id and staffCode=#{staffCode}) /(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book b INNER JOIN book_chapter bc on b.id=bc.book_id where b.id=book.id))*100 as percent, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book_info where book_id=book.id and status=1) as readedPer, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book_info where book_id=book.id) as allReadPer, (SELECT status FROM book_info where staffCode=#{staffCode} and book_id=book.id) status, book_name,book_img,book_overview,book_author,id FROM book
where id=#{id}
select content from book_chapter where id=#{id} order by id

select bi.id,book_id,book_review,status,staffCode,createTime,头像 as headPortrait,姓名 as name, (select COUNT(*) from book_comments_info where acceptStaffCode=#{staffCode} and book_id=bi.book_id AND type='点赞') as praise , (select COUNT(*) from book_comments_info where acceptStaffCode=#{staffCode} and book_id=bi.book_id AND type='超赞') as fabulous, (select COUNT(*) from book_comments_info where acceptStaffCode=#{staffCode} and book_id=bi.book_id AND type='收藏') as myenshrine from book_info bi inner join usertable u on bi.staffCode=u.员工编码 inner join datacenter_personnel d on bi.staffCode=d.人员编码 where book_id=#{book_id}
select count(*) from book_readed where staffCode=#{staffCode} and book_id=#{book_id} and chapter_id=#{chapter_id}
